Name: Keystone Library
About the game: Challenge your keyboard and puzzle skills in this casual book-themed adventure! Each book provides a unique story adventure, with ambient sound and illustration suited to the story. NOTE: We are in EARLY ACCESS and currently only 1 book available. More coming soon... Upgrade your character in the shop, navigate side quests, face a variety of great challenges on your journey through the story. Can you defeat the fierce MINI BOSSES and make it to the grand MEGA BOSS!? With emphasize on environmental illustration and sound design, we bring you the best experience possible within a minimalist 2D storybook feel! Readers, Writers, Typists, Coders, Story lovers, and especially Keyboard-Kungfu-Warriors! Come enjoy the magic of Keystone Library! (content updated regularly.)
